title: New: Fever Kids – Holding Grass
content:
Although they’ve been writing music together since 2011, the Athens-based boy/girl duo of Fever Kids are only just set to release their debut 7”. The first glimpse comes with the wonderful Holding Grass, a track where a pulsing disco beat drives the ethereal, dream pop vocals of lead singer, Σtella.

It’s like Blondie‘s sparkling moments polished for the demands of today’s audience. This song will haunt your speakers for the weeks ahead and prove that pop music is a die hard motherfucker.
